name: The 12 Olympians: A Greek dating sim
name_original: The 12 Olympians: A Greek dating sim
description:
The twelve gods is what happens when you take hades, make it more bisexual and have an autistic person (me) write most of the dialog

Yeah uh welcome to the 5 minute demo, I do hope you enjoy!

Most of the stuff is missing but I've ended up releasing this and writing the page in the last couple of hours. Screenshots are missing for now until I actually draw the textures lol. I'm hoping to get the game with finished stuff by Decemberish and polish the game by February.

I do hope it works! Please comment what you think I could improve, I'd love to hear your suggestions! 

Credit to friend for  most of the base drawings
